name: @common-utilities/new-pkg
description: Creates a new `common-utilities` batteries included pkg 📦
author: Jeff Wainwright <https://jeffry.in> (yowainwright@gmail.com)

scripts.test:new-pkg: echo '🚧 building a test package...' && ts-node src/program.ts package -d 'Testing new package' -n 'test'
scripts.test:new-pkg-exists: path-exists packages/test && echo '🎉 The test package exists!'
scripts.test:clean-up: echo '⏱ deleting test packages...' && rimraf packages
scripts.test: pnpm test:new-pkg && pnpm test:new-pkg-exists && pnpm test:clean-up
